text: IG-88 is a bounty hunter and assassin droid from Star Wars. He first appeared in 1980s, Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back and has gone on to appear in Star Wars Forces of Destiny and some comics. IG-88 was present with other bounty hunters including Bossk and Boba Fett when Darth Vader gave them a task to capture the Millennium Falcon. His head was made out of recycled props from Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope. IG-88 is voiced by Matthew Wood in Forces of Destiny. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1980s Category:Star Wars characters
title: IG-88
